short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Watch videos in a floating PiP window (always on top of other windows) even when tab is switched.
short.de: Videos in einem schwebenden PiP-Fenster ansehen (immer über anderen Fenstern), auch wenn die Registerkarte gewechselt wird.
short.es: Ver vídeos en una ventana PiP flotante (siempre encima de otras ventanas) incluso cuando se cambia de pestaña.
short.fr: Regardez des vidéos dans une fenêtre PiP flottante (toujours au-dessus des autres fenêtres), même lorsque vous changez d'onglet.
short.it: Guarda i video in una finestra PiP fluttuante (sempre in cima alle altre finestre) anche quando si cambia scheda.
short.ja: タブを切り替えても、PiPのフローティングウィンドウ（常に他のウィンドウの上に表示）で動画を見ることができます。
short.nl: Bekijk video's in een zwevend PiP venster (altijd boven andere vensters), zelfs wanneer van tab wordt gewisseld.
short.pt_BR: Veja vídeos em uma janela PiP flutuante (sempre em cima de outras janelas), mesmo quando a aba é trocada.
short.pt_PT: Ver vídeos numa janela PiP flutuante (sempre em cima de outras janelas), mesmo quando a aba é trocada.
short.ru: Просмотр видео в плавающем окне PiP (всегда поверх других окон) даже при переключении вкладок.
short.zh_CN: 在浮动的画中画窗口中观看视频（总是在其他窗口之上），即使切换标签时也是如此。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension brings a PiP view to all websites with an HTML video element. The extension adds a page action button to your browser. When a page has a video element, the color of this button changes. Press the button to open the active player in the Picture-in-Picture mode (PiP Mode). This extension automatically tries to use the active player.

For YouTube, the extension also offers an in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode. You can use this extension to watch YouTube videos in a floating window that is on top of all other windows so tabs can be switched and still the player is visible. The floating window has play and pause buttons, and you can exit from the picture-in-picture mode anytime.

What is the Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode: This mode lets you play any video in Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode, and it works on all platforms. PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player that floats on top of other windows. You can also reposition it along the screen border while you continue to surf the internet.

Notes: 
1. You need Chrome version >= 70 for this extension to work
2. This extension works for players in iframes
3. This extension is based on manifest v3
4. The extension includes a script that prevents the page from leaving the Picture-in-Picture view for 2 seconds from version 0.3.2. This script helps to address issues with pages that disable the Picture-in-Picture feature or cancel the Picture-in-Picture requests.
long.de:
PIP ist ein ausgestatteter Video-Player, der auf anderen Fenstern schwimmt. Bringen Sie den PIP -Modus auf einen beliebigen HTML5 -Video -Player auf jeder Website.

Verwenden Sie für YouTube die Schaltfläche In-Player neben der Schaltfläche Einstellungen, um das YouTube-Video im Bild-in-Bild-Modus zu öffnen.

--

PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player which floats on top of other windows. Bring the PIP mode to any HTML5 video player on any website.

For YouTube, use the in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode.
long.es:
PIP es un reproductor de video que aparece siempre en la cima que flota en la parte superior de Ofter Windows. Traiga el modo PIP a cualquier reproductor de video HTML5 en cualquier sitio web.

Para YouTube, use el botón en el jugador junto al botón Configuración para abrir el video de YouTube en el modo de imagen en imagen.

--

PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player which floats on top of other windows. Bring the PIP mode to any HTML5 video player on any website.

For YouTube, use the in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode.
long.fr:
PIP est un lecteur vidéo superbe et toujours sur le dessus qui flotte sur les autres fenêtres. Apportez le mode PIP à n'importe quel lecteur vidéo HTML5 sur n'importe quel site Web.

Pour YouTube, utilisez le bouton In-Player à côté du bouton Paramètres pour ouvrir la vidéo YouTube en mode Image-in-Picture.

--

PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player which floats on top of other windows. Bring the PIP mode to any HTML5 video player on any website.

For YouTube, use the in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode.
long.it:
PIP è un lettore video spuntato e sempre in cima che galleggia sopra altre finestre. Porta la modalità PIP a qualsiasi lettore video HTML5 su qualsiasi sito Web.

Per YouTube, utilizzare il pulsante In-Player accanto al pulsante Impostazioni per aprire il video di YouTube in modalità foto-in-put.

--

PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player which floats on top of other windows. Bring the PIP mode to any HTML5 video player on any website.

For YouTube, use the in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode.
long.ja:
Pipは、他の窓の上に浮かぶ、常にオンに並んでいる、常にオントップのビデオプレーヤーです。 任意のWebサイトの任意のHTML5ビデオプレーヤーにPIPモードを持ち込みます。

YouTubeの場合、[設定]ボタンの横にあるインプレイヤーボタンを使用して、Picture-in PictureモードでYouTubeビデオを開きます。

--

PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player which floats on top of other windows. Bring the PIP mode to any HTML5 video player on any website.

For YouTube, use the in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode.
long.nl:
Pip is een uitgestoken, altijd op een videospeler die bovenop andere ramen zweeft. Breng de PIP -modus naar elke HTML5 -videospeler op elke website.

Gebruik voor YouTube de knop In-Player naast de knop Instellingen om de YouTube-video in de modus Picture-in-Picture te openen.

--

PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player which floats on top of other windows. Bring the PIP mode to any HTML5 video player on any website.

For YouTube, use the in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode.
long.pt_BR:
Pip é um player de vídeo sempre no topo que flutua em cima de outras janelas. Traga o modo PIP para qualquer player de vídeo HTML5 em qualquer site.

Para o YouTube, use o botão In-Player ao lado do botão Configurações para abrir o vídeo do YouTube no modo Picture-in-Picture.

--

PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player which floats on top of other windows. Bring the PIP mode to any HTML5 video player on any website.

For YouTube, use the in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode.
long.pt_PT:
This extension brings a PiP view to all websites that have HTML video element. The extension adds a page action button to your browser. When a page has a video element, this button changes color. By pressing the button, the player that is active is opened in the Picture-in-Picture mode. This extension automatically tries to move the active player to the PiP mode. If there is no active player, then it selects from the list of inactive players.

For YouTube, the extension also offers an in-player button which is added next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode. You can use this extension to watch YouTube videos in a floating window that is on top of all other windows so tabs can be switched and still the player is visible. The floating window has play and pause buttons and you can exit from the picture-in-picture mode anytime.

What is the Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode: This mode lets you play any video in Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode, and it works on all platforms. PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player that floats on top of other windows. You can also reposition it along the screen border while you continue to surf the internet.

Notes: 
1. You need Chrome version >= 70 for this extension to work
2. This extension works for players in iframes
long.ru:
Pip é um player de vídeo sempre no topo que flutua no topo do Ofter Windows. Traga o modo PIP para qualquer player de vídeo HTML5 em qualquer site.

Para o YouTube, use o botão In-Player ao lado do botão Configurações para abrir o vídeo do YouTube no modo Picture-in-Picture.

--

PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player which floats on top of other windows. Bring the PIP mode to any HTML5 video player on any website.

For YouTube, use the in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode.
long.zh_CN:
PIP是一个弹出的，始终在顶部的视频播放器，它漂浮在其他窗户的顶部。 将PIP模式带到任何网站上的任何HTML5视频播放器。

对于YouTube，请使用“设置”按钮旁边的“播放器”按钮在图片模式下打开YouTube视频。

--

PiP is a popped-out, always-on-top video player which floats on top of other windows. Bring the PIP mode to any HTML5 video player on any website.

For YouTube, use the in-player button next to the settings button to open the YouTube video in the picture-in-picture mode.
